Description: Players that start the game get points.
If a player is subbed out they lose points.
If a player subs in they get points, but not as much as the line-up.
The player recieves a second yellow card after getting one the previous game.
The player is expelled from the game. Also counts as 2 yellow cards in the same game.
Player scored a spectacular goal! Can be: headbutt, bicycle kick, or from own side of the field.
Player does the last pass before a goal is scored.
